description: Useles. Does not load. An unreliable backup tool that does not backup is the worst case scenario.
I guess you must install it using the CLI.
Was able to backup ~1300GB worth of data using only ~600GB disk space due to Kopia's smart deduplication and compression features.

A cross-platform backup system that seems to be able to do everything and then some...

...falls flat on its face when I try to recover a backup. Apparently a "kopia.maintenance.f" file is missing from the backup drive--rendering the entire backup totally useless. Not quite what I had in mind!
Looks very nice so far, much faster tham backintime 1.2.1 on my Mageia Desktop
